Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Aerococcus viridans (MIC=1.9-2.92 µM), Micrococcus luteus (MIC=1.9-2.92 µM), Bacillus megaterium (MIC>50 µM), Saphylococcus aureus (MIC>50 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli 363 (MIC=22-33 µM), Vibrio vulnificus (MIC>50 µM), Salmonella thyphimurium (MIC>50 µM), Klebsiella pneumoniae (MIC>50 µM).Fungi:Fusarium oxysporum (MIC=0.84-1.26 µM), Botrytis cinerea (MIC=4.38-6.57 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Posesses antibacterial and antifungal activity. Presents chitin-binding activity (By similarity).
Sequence Information.PTM: Contains three disulfide bonds 23-37; 26-44; 38-45 and C-terminal amidation.

Literature.Title: Diversity of the penaeidin antimicrobial peptides in two shrimp species.
Literature.Author: Cuthbertson BJ, Shepard EF, Chapman RW, Gross PS.

Literature.Title: A new class (penaeidin class 4) of antimicrobial peptides from the Atlantic white shrimp (Litopenaeus setiferus) exhibits target specificity and an independent proline-rich-domain function.
Literature.Author: Cuthbertson BJ, Bullesbach EE, Fievet J, Bachère E, Gross PS.
